solution.text:
Height of cylinder, h\(=_{j}_\,cm\)
Diameter of cylinder, d\(=_{k}_\,cm\Rightarrow\)Radius of cylinder, r\(=_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_\,cm\)
Volume of cylinder\(=\pi r^2h\)
\(=\pi \times _{{k/Decimal(2)}}_^2 \times _{j}_\)
\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))**2*j),3)}}_\,cm^3\)

content.text: Find the volume of a cylinder of height \(_{j}_\,cm\) and diameter \(_{k}_\,cm\).
